document: ANALYSIS OF METAL MATRIX COMPOSITE STRUCTURES USING A MICROMECHANICAL CONSTITUTIVE THEORY by Robert Thomas Arenburg Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in Engineering Mechanics APPROVED: J. N. Reddy, Chairman J. Aboudi S. L. Hendricks E. G. Henneke E. R. Johnson D.T. Mook December, 1988 Blacksburg, Virginia
